SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Main Controller class. It gets messages from the GameThread and calls and changes the model.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller(BlockingQueue<ThreadMessage> messageQ, Integer maxPlayers)
      Constructor for the Controller class.
      Parameters:
      messageQ - the BlockingQueue that will contain the messages.
      maxPlayers - the maximum number of players that can join a game.

  • Method Details

    • getGame

      public Game getGame()
      Getter for the Game.
      Returns:
      the Game object.

    • createGame

      public void createGame(String username, Integer playerNum, UUID gameId, UUID messageId)
      Controller Method to create a new Game.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player that creates the game.
      playerNum - the number of players that will join the game.
      gameId - the unique identifier of the game.
      messageId - the unique identifier of the message.

    • join

      public void join(String username, UUID messageId)
      Controller Method to join a Game.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player that joins the game.
      messageId - the unique identifier of the message.

    • randomizePlayers

      public void randomizePlayers()
      Controller Method to randomize the order of the players. Used to randomize the turn order of the players in the game.

    • update

      public void update(String username, boolean playerTurn, UUID messageId)
      Updates the message queue with a thread message representing an update response.
      Parameters:
      username - the username associated with the update
      playerTurn - indicates if it's the player's turn
      messageId - the unique identifier of the message

    • placeCard

      public boolean placeCard(String username, Coordinates coordinates, Integer cardId, UUID messageId)
      Controller Method to place a card.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player that places the card.
      coordinates - the coordinates where to place the card.
      cardId - the unique identifier of the card.
      messageId - the unique identifier of the message.

    • draw

      public boolean draw(String username, Integer index, UUID messageId)
      Controller Method to draw a card.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player that draws the card.
      index - the index of where to draw the card. 4 for the standard deck, 5 for the gold deck, 0-3 for the visible cards.
      messageId - the unique identifier of the message.

    • getPlayers

      public void getPlayers(String username, UUID messageId)
      Retrieves the usernames of all players in the game and sends a response message.
      Parameters:
      username - the username initiating the request
      messageId - the unique identifier of the message

    • choosePersonalObjective

      public void choosePersonalObjective(String username, Integer objId, UUID messageId)
      Controller Method to choose a personal objective.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player that chooses the objective.
      objId - the unique identifier of the chosen objective.
      messageId - the unique identifier of the message.

      username - the username of the player choosing the color
      playerColor - the chosen color by the player
      messageId - the unique identifier of the message

    • getPlayerColor

      Parameters:

      usernameRequiredData - the username of the player whose color is being requested
      messageId - the unique identifier of the message

      usernameRequiredData - the username of the player whose hand types are being requested

    • placeStartingCard

      public void placeStartingCard(String username, boolean bool, UUID messageId)
      Sets the first card placement for a specified player and sends an OK response.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player setting the first card placement
      bool - the boolean value indicating the first card placement status
      messageId - the unique identifier of the message
